ReportStepClass.ExecuteTest: With this attribute the execution of pass/fail test can be switched on/off
ReportStepClass.ErrorMessage: Here a specific message for a possible error case can be placed
ReportStepClass.TestDescription: This attribute will be copied into the final testreport as the description of the test being performed
ReportStepClass.TestCriteria: This attribute will be copied into the final testreport as the test criteria e.g. upper/lower limits
ReportStepClass.TestMeasurement: In this attribute the result of the measurement will be stored in.
ReportStepClass.TestResult: Here the final verdict of the test "pass/fail/skipped" will be placed.
